items.sentence: I thought Tom would be better at doing that.
I shouldn't have agreed to help Tom do that.
I have no idea why Tom wanted me to do that.
I have no idea when Tom wants me to do that.
I have no idea when Tom is going to do that.
I don't think Tom would be happy doing that.
I don't think Tom will permit me to do that.
I don't think Tom will allow you to do that.
I don't think I have to tell Tom to do that.
I don't remember telling Tom not to do that.
Do you really think Tom is going to do that?
I suspect that Tom and Mary need to do that.
Tom said that he didn't have to do that now.
Tom said that he didn't get paid to do that.
Tom said that he did that at home yesterday.
Tom said that he couldn't resist doing that.
Tom said that he couldn't recall doing that.
Tom said that he couldn't help Mary do that.
Tom said he assumed that Mary would do that.
I don't really need to learn how to do that.
